hibernate-mapping.query: FROM ProjectAssignment pa WHERE pa.project.active is true AND pa.project.projectId = :projectId AND pa.user.userId = :userId
FROM ProjectAssignment pa WHERE pa.project.active is true AND pa.project.customer.active is true AND pa.user = :user ORDER BY pa.dateStart, pa.project.name

FROM ProjectAssignment pa WHERE pa.project.active is true AND pa.project.customer.active is true AND pa.user.userId = :userId AND pa.assignmentType.assignmentTypeId = :type ORDER BY pa.dateStart, pa.project.name

FROM ProjectAssignment pa WHERE pa.active is true AND pa.project.active is true AND pa.project.customer.active is true AND pa.user.userId = :userId AND (pa.dateStart IS NULL OR pa.dateStart <= :dateEnd) AND (pa.dateEnd IS NULL or pa.dateEnd >= :dateStart)

FROM ProjectAssignment pa WHERE pa.active is true AND pa.project.active is true AND pa.project.customer.active is true AND pa.project = :project AND (pa.dateStart IS NULL OR pa.dateStart < :dateEnd) AND (pa.dateEnd IS NULL or pa.dateEnd > :dateStart)
FROM ProjectAssignment pa WHERE pa.project.customer is :customer AND (pa.dateStart IS NULL OR pa.dateStart < :dateEnd) AND (pa.dateEnd IS NULL or pa.dateEnd > :dateStart)
